title: De'Vion Harmon signs with Red Raiders - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: De'Vion Harmon signs with Red Raiders - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Texas Tech head coach Mark Adams has officially announced the signing of guard De'Vion Harmon to a financial aid agreement. Harmon returns to his home state and the Big 12 after playing last season at Oregon and the previous two at Oklahoma. A Denton, Texas native and Guyer High graduate, he transfers to Tech with two years of eligibility remaining and having already produced 928 points, 186 assists and 108 steals in his career.
